title: The Sheriff Gets His Girl
description: After a relationship gone bad, Maryanne runs back to Texas to find the fun girl she used to be. But one wild night with childhood friend Gunner quickly turns into more than just fun.  Straight laced Gunner has worked hard to become sheriff of his hometown. To protect and serve goes beyond just a job when it comes to Maryanne though. He's kept her at arms length for years, but now this firecracker's kiss keeps drawing him back.When a one-night stand leads to more--including a baby--will these friends turned lovers let their opposing natures and the chaos of their hometown and her ex drive a permanent wedge between them and their growing family?
author: Jane Poller
